Package cpw.mods.fml.server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FMLServerHandler
    Handles primary communication from hooked code into the system The FML entry point is FMLServerHandler.beginServerLoading(MinecraftServer) called from DedicatedServer Obfuscated code should focus on this class and other members of the "server" (or "client") code The actual mod loading is handled at arms length by Loader It is expected that a similar class will exist for each target environment: Bukkit and Client side.
